GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.14.10
GSD.description:
crypto: ccp - fix resource leaks in ccp_run_aes_gcm_cmd()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit e450c422aa233e9f80515f2ee9164e33f158a472, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 36cf515b9bbe298e1ce7384620f0d4ec45ad3328. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: crypto: ccp - fix resource leaks in ccp_run_aes_gcm_cmd()
